tutorial HCI_Testing Tutorial Button_change Skip Next>
Drink Smartly 8 glasses of water a day is a basic principle but we usually forgot when and how much water to drink. h2o lets you form an accurate drinking habit in an interesting way
Drink Regularly In h2o, you will get a reminder roughly every 2 hours to notify you to drink regularly. The water meter drops as time goes on. Tap on the drink button to interact with the water meter
Drink adequately In addition to drink regularly, you also need to drink adequately to remain good health. Choose on the different amount of water you frink each time
"com.nasri.com.MyPref" "com.nasri.com.MyPrefKey"
